resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Fixed an issue that was causing random force close problems on specific servers.

--- NEW FEATURES
*Default button set (for new connections).
*Added .loadset and .clearbuttons special commands.

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

---- TEST VERSION 3 ----
*Many many bug fixes.
*It is best to see the list at the website.
http://www.offsetnull.com/blog

---- TEST VERSION 3 ----
*Added automatic update check on launcher start.

---- TEST VERSION 2 ----
*This is the new test version, pretty much everything has changed.. See the website for more info.
